Posts.Content: May 1, 2012 05:34PM sflgm wrote: Hello everyone, I'm new to the forum. I will have bilateral mastectomy with immediate reconstruction on May 15th. I have history of ADH and ALH on the left breast, lumpectomy in 2008 and diagnosed with IDC, 1.5 mm. I was offered lumpectomy with radiation but I opted for BMX with sentinel nodes biopsy. Just today I had another biopsy of an enlarged lymph node on the diseased side. It could be inflamed from the biopsy I had on March 29 that diagnosed the IDC but my doctors want to be sure. They said the surgery strategy would be different if that node comes back positive. It all hit me like a ton of bricks although I have been tested and watched since the ADH and ALH. I would have some type of test every 6 months but somehow it slipped undetected.I am trying to mentally prepare myself for what awaits me.
